NOT IN on Alessandro Lacava /tags/not-in/ Recent content in NOT IN on Alessandro Lacava Hugo en-us <<<<<<< HEAD Wed, 04 Jun 2008 13:24:09 +0000 ======= Wed, 04 Jun 2008 13:24:09 +0000 >>>>>>> origin/master NOT IN vs. NOT EXISTS when NULL values are involved /blog/not-in-vs-not-exists-when-null-values-are-involved/ Wed, 04 Jun 2008 13:24:09 +0000 /blog/not-in-vs-not-exists-when-null-values-are-involved/ <<<<<<< HEAD

NOT IN does not behave as you would expect when NULL values are involved. Suppose you have the following tables:

CD_FIELD DS_FIELD
1 ALPHA
2 BETA
**TABLE_A**
CD_FIELD DS_FIELD
1 GAMMA
NULL DELTA
**TABLE_B**

Now try the following query:

   
SELECT *
FROM table_a a
WHERE a.cd_field NOT IN (SELECT b.cd_field FROM table_b b);

Does the previous query return any row? The answer is NO it doesn’t, even if there is a value (2) in table_a.cd_field which is not present in table_b.cd_field.

======= NOT IN does not behave as you would expect when NULL values are involved. Suppose you have the following tables: CD_FIELD DS_FIELD 1 ALPHA 2 BETA **TABLE_A** CD_FIELD DS_FIELD 1 GAMMA NULL DELTA **TABLE_B** Now try the following query: SELECT * FROM table_a a WHERE a.cd_field NOT IN (SELECT b.cd_field FROM table_b b); Does the previous query return any row? The answer is NO it doesn’t, even if there is a value (2) in table_a. >>>>>>> origin/master
